directions: Combine all ingredients in heavy medium saucepan. Bring to boil, stirring often. Reduce heat to medium and simmer until chutney thickens and kumquats are translucent, stirring often, about 20 minutes. Cool completely. Discard cinnamon stick. (Can be prepared 5 days ahead. Cover and refrigerate.)
ingredients: 8 ounces kumquats, cut into 1/4-inch-thick rounds, seeded
title: Cranberry-Kumquat Chutney
